name: Survivalist (itch) (Rasmus Rasmussen)
description:
This game idea was inspired by modern day survival games and old school DOS software, like Norton Commander. You wake up on a tropical island with nothing and no one around...

Use a keyboard to select one action at a time, and follow the events in the log.

This is a prototype. Crafting is an intended addition, but it is not yet added to the game. A more polished version would also have a deeper story to uncover.
